chunk:
Esfolio Collagen Cleansing Foam

Brand: Esfolio

Category: Facial Cleanser

Brand: Esfolio

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: purified water, palmitic acid, stearic acid, glycerin, myristic acid, lauric acid, potassium, hydroxide, cocamidopropyl betaine, sorbitan olivate, cocamide MIPA, portulaca oleracea extract, centella asiatica extract, lavandula angustifolia flower extract, monarda didyma leaf extract

Directions: Take a moderate amount and lather up. Massage the face gently with rich foam and rinse off thoroughly with lukewarm water.

Ingredient concerns: LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
